title: Energy
creator_credit: Barbara Buce, Arthur G. Evans and Oxford Films (U.S.)
brief_description: Explores energy in humans, animals, the elements and the earth. Shows how these kinds of energy are harnessed and how they are used daily in home and industry. Shows that pollution is a result of excessive use and barren devastation is a result of a lack of conservation. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
